query:
SELECT d.id id,
                           d.title title,
                           d.content content,
                           d.category category,
                           d.created_at created_at,
                           d.updated_at updated_at,
                           d.user_id user_id,
                           d.state state,
                           d.pinned pinned,
                           d.deleted deleted,
                           d.deleted_at deleted_at,
                           u.username user_name,
                           u.avatar_url avatar_url
                    FROM discussions d
                             LEFT JOIN users u ON d.user_id = u.id
                    WHERE d.id = ANY ($1) AND d.deleted = false
